version_description: Bug fix and improvements.
Bug fix and improvements.

1.We solved some network connection issues；
2.Bug fix and improvements.

The team has prepared a mysterious present for you all during Christmas! Head over our Facebook fan-page before Christmas to find out!
https://www.facebook.com/Archero-1705569912922526

New Hero: Meowgik, a hero with kitty power!
New Weapons: Stalker Staff, Brightspear
New Equipment: Lockets & Bracelets, wear them to get interesting powers!
New Daily Events: Xmas Event! Complex mazes, crazy monsters, plenty of presents!
Added Portal in Chapter 5
Added BattlePass Season End Countdown
Optimized Shop NPC & UI 
Bugs fixed.

Lowering chapter diffculty and improving item drop rate;
Bug fixes and some improvements.
Bug fixes and some improvements.
Bug fixes and improvements.
Bug fixes and some improvements.

1.Hero Mode is available now！(Reach Level 4-25)Elite monsters & bosses are here! New chapter chests up for grabs now!
2.Difficulty adjustment for some chapters
3.Italian localization added.
Bug fixes and improvements.
Bug fixes and some improvements.

5 new characters going online! Pick your favorite one to tear up the battlefield.(Reach Level 2-1)
First Season BattlePass is going online.
Turkish localization Added.

Lowering chapter diffculty and improving item drop rate;
Bug fixes and some improvements.

New Daily Events (Defeat Chapter 3 to unlock).
New Hero Growth System, Special Stones to upgrade (drops after beating Chapter 3).
New Hero: Helix.
Increased some drops for XP, Coins, etc.

New Dismantle feature: Dismantle equipment to get materials and Coins
New Female Hero: Bonnie
New Chapter 13: Lava Land
New Hero Mode Chapter 4 & 5
New Welcome Back rewards for lost players
Optimized certain skill effects, reduced chapter difficulties, optimized gaming experience.

The team has prepared a mysterious present for you all during Christmas! Head over our Facebook fan-page before Christmas to find out!
https://www.facebook.com/Archero-1705569912922526

New Hero: Meowgik, a hero with kitty power!
New Weapons: Stalker Staff, Brightspear
New Equipment: Lockets & Bracelets, wear them to get interesting powers!
New Daily Events: Xmas Event! Complex mazes, crazy monsters, plenty of presents!
Added Portal in Chapter 5
Added BattlePass Season End Countdown
Optimized Shop NPC & UI 
Bugs fixed.

-New Chapter 14
-New Daily Events: Spring Festival, defeat monsters to win rewards!
-New Hero: Sylvan, elf prince with strong elemental attacks
-Fixed certain bugs when attacking Bosses
-Fixed certain equipment skill explanation errors
-Fixed certain chapter display bugs
-Fixed Meowgik's 'Rage' bug

After the Spring Festival, there'll be a new mysterious event; stay tuned to our Facebook page for more details (on Facebook, search 'Archero')
Also a spoiler! We'll be launching something that players have been looking forward to very soon! Stay tuned!

New Content:
- Newly added skills for battle
- New Equipment Class: Ancient Legendary
- New Coins concealer view feature

Optimizations:
- Offline earnings for Sapphires
- Meteor and Star skills will now attack enemy areas
- Spring Festival event scene colors
- More rewards added in Battle Pass
- Bug fixes

New Content:
-Hero Duo: 2person teams; challenge to win!
-Hero’s Adventure: 3 Heroes on an adventure; infinite challenges
-15 Day Daily Rewards for all our Archers
-New hero: Shari (take part by following our Facebook fan-page @archerogame)
-Hero Mode: Chapters 6 & 7

Optimizations:
-Fixed Locket’s special skill conditions
-Optimized Event mode’s difficulty
-Optimized Shop page
-Optimized data sync, reduced chances of data loss.

New Content:
-Hero Duo: 2person teams; challenge to win!
-Hero’s Adventure: 3 Heroes on an adventure; infinite challenges
-15 Day Daily Rewards for all our Archers
-New hero: Shari (take part by following our Facebook fan-page @archerogame)
-Hero Mode: Chapters 6 & 7

Optimizations:
-Fixed Locket’s special skill conditions
-Optimized Event mode’s difficulty
-Optimized Shop page
-Optimized data sync, reduced chances of data loss.

New Content:
2 New Rings
-Bull Ring - Contains the power of bulls, use it to increase attacks on all small monsters
-Lion Ring - Contains the power of a berserk lion, use it to increase attacks on boss monsters
2 New skills added to Hero Adventure
-Heroic Fightback
-Fury Command

Optimizations
-Fixed incorrect plagiarism notices
-Fixed crashes on certain devices
-Fixed issue with unlocking new chapters automatically

New Content:

2 New Rings
-Bull Ring - Contains the power of bulls, use it to increase attacks on all small monsters
-Lion Ring - Contains the power of a berserk lion, use it to increase attacks on boss monsters
2 New skills added to Hero Adventure
-Heroic Fightback
-Fury Command

Optimizatios
-Fixed incorrect plagiarism notices
-Fixed crashes on certain devices
-Fixed issue with unlocking new chapters automatically

What's New

-New Equipment: Spell Book

A newly added type of equipment, use it to get an Ultimate skill.

-New Hero: Shade

Killer of shadows, queen of the night; she can switch between her real and shadow self in battle.

-Daily Quests and Achievement

Complete quests to get rewards!

What's New

-New Equipment: Spell Book

A newly added type of equipment, use it to get an Ultimate skill.

-New Hero: Shade

Killer of shadows, queen of the night; she can switch between her real and shadow self in battle.

-Daily Quests and Acheivement

Complete quests to get rewards!

- Newly added Normal Mode Chapter 15: Pharaoh's Chamber
- Newly added Hero Mode Chapter 8-9
- Optimizations on in-game skills (including Poisoned Touch, Smart, Meteor, Star and more than 30 other skills)
- Newly added Event feature: exclusive quests with rewards!
- Fixed bugs

Archero - 1 Year Anniversary! Rewards The Entire Month!
New Expedition Game Mode: Mini stages for quick runs!
New Runes System
New Daily Events: Temple Escape
New Hero Mode Chapter 10
New Hero: Ayana
New Equipments - 4 of them!
Talents System Upgrade: 3 New Talents - Reduced Costs, Increased Effects
Time Rewards Upgrade: Newly added XP, Runes, Scrolls
BattlePass Upgrade: New Privileges, Same Price!

- New Infinite Adventure: Complete challenges during Seasons to get rewards!
- New Hero Mode Chapter 12 - 14
- New Expedition 300 - 360
- New Hero Trial Mode
- BattlePass Upgrades:
New Reset Card, can reset a skill to select
New Ultimate Chest

- New System: Hero Evolution
- New Chapter: Hero Mode 15&16

- 4 New Equipments: Piercer Locket, Bloodthirsty Locket, Invincible Bracelet, Quickshot Bracelet

-New Weekly Bonus Rewards: Login to claim everyday!

1.All New Mode: Ancient Maze
-Explore the maze and find the treasure!
2.New Function: Blacksmith
-Bulk Dismantle: One button to break down equipment
-You can exchange equipment for a new random one.
3. New Event: Lucky Spin
-Super value treasures await you!
4. All New Ability
-Added new abilities to normal mode chapter 12 & 13

- Newly added Main Chapter 24 & 25

- Newly added Main Chapter 26 - Land of the Dead
- Mystery Mine has a new Battle Contract feature, you can use it to increase difficulty for more rewards
- Newly added Weapon - Demon Blade-Rain, melee and long-range attack weapon
- New Hero - Shingen, mysterious samurai

- Newly added Main Chapter 26 - Land of the Dead
- Mystery Mine has a new Battle Contract feature, you can use it to increase difficulty for more rewards
- Newly added Weapon - Demon Blade-Rain, melee and long-range attack weapon
- New Hero - Shingen, mysterious samurai
- New Outfit - Family Armor (Shingen), Mermaid Garb (Aquea)
- Monster Hatchery has a new mini-game

- New social system - Clan; you can now:
           a. Make new friends
           b. Help others with Hatching
           c.  Exchange Hero Shards, equipment and Jewels
           d. Get Clan Points to purchase rare items
- New Normal Chapter 27 - Sky Castle
- New Hero found in Clan - Gugu, a strong owl warrior
- New Achievements
- Fixed certain bugs

- Newly added Normal Mode Chapter 28 - Sandy Town
- Exclusive Halloween Carnival
- Limited time Halloween gameplay
- Newly added Halloween Outfits (Helix, Ryan, Gugu)
- Hero Duel added Energy Matches with special rules
- Cargo Ship has a new Gem refresh option
- Other fixes and optimizations

- Added Chapter 29 - Dark Forest to the main questline.
- Added Clan event - Monster Treasure. Clan members work to collect special items to obtain monsters' precious treasure.
- Added some new monsters and monster eggs to spice things up!
- Added VIP subscription privileges offering heaps of benefits!
- Added new function-Bulk merge Jewels
- Twist of Fate event has returned with upgraded rewards!
- Improvements to interfaces and performance.

- Added Chapter 29 - Dark Forest to the main questline.
- Added Clan event - Monster Treasure. Clan members work to collect special items to obtain monsters' precious treasure.
- Added some new monsters and monster eggs to spice things up!
- Added VIP subscription privileges offering heaps of benefits!
- Added new function-Bulk merge Jewels
- Twist of Fate event has returned with upgraded rewards!
- Improvements to interfaces and performance.

- New: Monster Arena.
- New hero: Iris
- New: Christmas Party and stages. 
- New: Normal Chapters 30 and 31 & their Hero Chapters
- Expedition mode unlocked till Stage 460.
- Increased level caps for multiple systems:
*Hero level cap: 120
*Talent level cap: 206
- New equipment rarity: Mythic.
- Jewel System fully unlocked: Jewels can be embedded in all equipment parts.
- Hero Duel optimized:Gem Match: 10/20/100 Gems
- Lowered the difficulty of some normal chapters.
